name: Klaus Mueller
learned: Klaus Mueller is a student at Oak Hill College studying sociology. He is passionate about social justice and loves to explore different perspectives.
currently: Status: Klaus Mueller attended the Physics and Social Justice Project appointment with Maria Lopez on Wednesday February 15 at 3:00 PM at Oak Hill College. He was excited to continue exploring the impact of physics on social justice issues and collaborate with Maria on this important project. Klaus felt motivated and passionate about making a positive impact through their collaborative efforts. He valued organization and dedication in his academic work and research, and was committed to creating meaningful and impactful experiences in everything he did.
lifestyle: Klaus Mueller goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 7am, eats dinner around 5pm.
